thread.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' requires grit, pain tolerance
thread.title_full: 'Dancing with the Stars' requires grit, pain tolerance

title: 'Dancing with the Stars' requires grit, pain tolerance
text:
> Entertainment 'Dancing with the Stars' requires grit, pain tolerance In this Sept. 22, 2015 photo released by ABC, Tony Dovolani, left, and Kim Zolciak Biermann perform on the celebrity dance competition series, "Dancing with the Stars," in Los Angeles. Zolciak Biermann is the latest contestant who has injured themselves, either on, or while rehearsing for the show. She suffered a so-called "mini-stroke" flying home from Los Angeles. (Adam Taylor/ABC via AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
